body:
Comment 9 by **chris@altonymous.com**: 
If go get us going to use git to manage the lib then it should adhere to git rules.  If
it is going to force me to mix my project with the GOPATH for building projects and I
choose to use git as my repository, it should respect that.  If it doesn't to these by
default the there should be a .goignore file or something g to tell it what I desire it
to exclude in my project directory.
